## For whom is OpenML?

- Domain scientists
- Data analysts
- Algorithm developers
- Students
- Teachers
- ...


## OpenML with R
```{r, eval=FALSE}
tsk.id <- 10
tsk <- getOMLTask(tsk.id)

lrn <- makeLearner("classif.cforest", ntree = 1000, mtry = 4)
run <- runTaskMlr(task = tsk, learner = lrn)
rid <- uploadOMLRun(run, confirm.upload = FALSE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
tsk.id <- 10
rid <- 6067862
```

```{r}
evals <- listOMLRunEvaluations(task.id = tsk.id)
```


## OpenML with R
```{r, fig.height=4}
mlrevals <- evals[grep("mlr", evals$flow.name), ]
ggplot(mlrevals, aes(x = predictive.accuracy, y = flow.name)) + 
  geom_point()
```



## OpenML is...
- Online
- Open
- Collaborative
- Rewarding
- Easy (to use and to contribute)


## Papers

Casalicchio, G., Bossek, J., Lang, M., Kirchhoff, D., Kerschke, P., Hofner, B., Seibold, H., Vanschoren, J., Bischl, B. (2017).   
**OpenML: An R Package to Connect to the Networked Machine Learning Platform OpenML.**   
*ArXiv e-prints*, [arxiv.org/abs/1701.01293](https://arxiv.org/abs/1701.01293).
 
Vanschoren, J., Van Rijn, J. N., Bischl, B., Torgo, L. (2014).    
**OpenML: networked science in machine learning.**   
*ACM SIGKDD Explorations Newsletter*, 15(2), 49-60, 
[doi:10.1145/2641190.2641198](https://doi.org/10.1145/2641190.2641198).
